0HM.SG.summary: HansaMatrix AS develops and manufactures electronic systems in Baltic, Nordic, other European Union countries, and internationally. The company offers electronics optics and imaging products; and Internet of Things products, including RF connectivity solutions, embedded hardware solutions, embedded software/firmware, and battery powered systems, as well as deploys Android/Linux/Win10 operating systems. It also provides smart city solutions; liquid crystal and optical devices; scientific and medical equipment; robotics and automation solutions; product engineering services; assembled electronic PCB and system testing; quality management systems; rapid prototype, optical and display systems, and other manufacturing services; and product engineering. In addition, the company engages in the creation and licensing of intellectual property; and develops industrial real estate project. It serves industrial systems, data network infrastructure, transportation, renewable energy, medical, defense, and other B2B (business-to-business) market sectors. The company was formerly known as Hanzas Elektronika, SIA and changed its name to HansaMatrix AS in January 2016. HansaMatrix AS was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Ogre, Latvia.

BAL1R.RG.summary: AS Latvijas balzams produces and sells alcoholic beverages in Latvia. The company produces approximately 100 types of alcoholic beverages. It offers sparkling and fortified wines, ciders, ready to drink (RTD) products, vodkas, liqueurs, brandies, other alcoholic beverages, gin, etc.; and non-alcoholic drinks. The company provides its products under the Stolichnaya, elit, Moskovskaya, Moskovskaya Infusion, Riga Black Vodka, Amber Gold Vodka, LB Vodka, 3 Graudu, Pshenichnaya, Latvijas originalais, ??????, Bonaparte, Grand Cavalier, Hektors, Piparu rugtais, Riga Black Balsam, Cross Keys Gin, LB Gin, Kristofors, Moka, Âarlote, Riga Black Balsam Cream, AllaÂu kimelis, Benediktins, Sparkling wine ÂRIGA Sparkling', Cosmopolitan Diva, Rigas Prestige CuvÃ©e, Sovetskoje, Svetskoje, Black Balsam, cocktails, LB coctails, Dins, Moskovskaya cocktails, Lucky Dog, Apple Garden, Cosmopolitan Diva non-alcoholic, Riga Sparkling non-alcoholic drink, and Quick Fox brands, as well as under private labels. It sells its products through wholesalers, as well as retail stores. The company also exports its products to approximately 180 markets worldwide. In addition, it provides transit assurance, bonded warehouse, logistics, value added, and picking services, etc. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Riga, Latvia. AS Latvijas balzams is a subsidiary of Amber Beverage Group Holding S.Ã  r.l.

BTE1R.RG.summary: Baltic Telekom AS operates as a holding company. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

DPK1R.RG.summary: AS Ditton pievadkezu rupnica manufactures and sells driving chains in Europe and internationally. It operates through Western and Eastern segments. The company offers roller, motorcycle and snowmobile, automotive, leaf, special, and other chains. It also engages in the manufacture and sale of parts and accessories for motor vehicles; manufacture and repair of fabricated metal products, mechanisms, and equipment; installation of production equipment and devices; sale, maintenance, and repair of motorcycles, accessories, and related parts; and manufacture of metal tanks, reservoirs, and containers. In addition, the company is involved in forging, pressing, stamping, and rolling metals and metallurgy powder; treatment and coating of metals; warehousing and storage business; buying and sale of real estate properties; leasing and building facility management of owned and leased real estate properties; metal constructions; and other activities. The company was formerly known as Joint Stock Company Daugavpils pievadkezu rupnica and changed its name to AS Ditton Pievadkezu Rupnica in January 2002. AS Ditton Pievadkezu Rupnica was founded in 1949 and is based in Daugavpils, Latvia.

GZE1R.RG.summary: AS Latvijas Gaze engages in the purchase, trading, distribution, and sale of natural gas in Latvia, Lithuania, and Estonia. It operates through Natural Gas Sales & Trading, and Natural Gas Distribution segments. The company supplies natural gas to approximately 400 thousand customers in Latvia. It serves industrial and commercial customers, as well as households. The company is based in Riga, Latvia.

HMX1R.RG.summary: HansaMatrix AS develops and manufactures electronic systems in Baltic, Nordic, other European Union countries, and internationally. The company offers electronics optics and imaging products; and Internet of Things products, including RF connectivity solutions, embedded hardware solutions, embedded software/firmware, and battery powered systems, as well as deploys Android/Linux/Win10 operating systems. It also provides smart city solutions; liquid crystal and optical devices; scientific and medical equipment; robotics and automation solutions; product engineering services; assembled electronic PCB and system testing; quality management systems; rapid prototype, optical and display systems, and other manufacturing services; and product engineering. In addition, the company engages in the creation and licensing of intellectual property; and develops industrial real estate project. It serves industrial systems, data network infrastructure, transportation, renewable energy, medical, defense, and other B2B (business-to-business) market sectors. The company was formerly known as Hanzas Elektronika, SIA and changed its name to HansaMatrix AS in January 2016. HansaMatrix AS was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Ogre, Latvia.

KA11R.RG.summary: A/S Kurzemes Atslega 1 engages in the manufacture of hardware for windows and doors, and metal forgings; and metalworking and woodworking activities in Latvia and other European Union countries. It offers hardware for doors and windows, such as door locks and handles, furniture hardware, hinges and gate hinges, padlocks, window hardware, mortise locks, and rim locks. The company is also involved in the provision of metalworking works, which includes stamping, folding, turning, welding and grinding, and milling and sawing of parts; punching and cutting metal sheets, bending of metals, plasma cutting, powder coating, and tempering services; and manufacture of stamping dies and molds, as well as repairing them. In addition, it offers zinc, chrome, and nickel plated coatings; forged metal gates, fences, and handrails for stairs and balconies; CNC turning and milling; aluminum/zinc and plastic casting; and powder painting services. Further, the manufactures and installs wooden panel and frame houses, and mobile and module houses; constructs wooden frame houses, as well as customizes orders for manufacture and installation of houses; and provides perforated plates and various connecting pieces for construction. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1890 and is based in Aizpute, Latvia.

LJM1R.RG.summary: A/S Latvijas Juras medicinas centrs provides health care services in the Republic of Latvia. The company engages in the general and special medical practice, dental practice, human health, residential nursing care, residential care, social work, physical well-being, and other personal service activities; provision of other education services; and the retail sale of medical and orthopedic goods in specialized stores. It operates an ambulatory health care center, a hospital, a hospital and diagnostic center, and a primary health care center in Riga. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Riga, the Republic of Latvia.

MDARA.RG.summary: AS MADARA Cosmetics, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells natural cosmetics and personal care products under the MADARA and MOSSA brand names in the Baltic and Northern European region. The company offers face, anti-age, body, hair, perfume, and mother and baby products, as well as products for men. It also provides contract manufacturing services for cosmetic products. The company exports its products to approximately 20 countries, primarily within the European Union. It offers its products through retailers, as well as online. AS MADARA Cosmetics was founded in 2006 and is based in Marupe, Latvia.

OLF1R.RG.summary: AS Olainfarm manufactures and distributes chemical and pharmaceutical products in Latvia. The company operates through five segments: Medicine Production, Wholesale, Retail, Compression Materials, and Other. It provides over the counter and prescription medicines, including anti-allergy, anti-inflammatory and analgesic, antibacterial, common cold, digestive system, metabolic, antifungal, and antiviral, as well as medicines for cardiovascular health, and digestive and nervous systems; and food supplements. The company also offers active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and intermediates; pharmacovigilance services for patients, physicians, and pharmacists; and QC/QA, regulatory, APIs and intermediates development, final dosage forms development, and contract manufacturing services. In addition, it engages in the sale of medicine and other products to retailers; operation of a pharmacy chain under the Latvijas Aptieka name; production and sale of elastic and compression materials, dietary supplements, herbal infusions, and eco-cosmetics; and provision of travelling, marketing, and public services. The company also exports its products to approximately 60 countries, including the Baltics, Russia, other CIS countries, Europe, Asia, North America, and Australia. AS Olainfarm was founded in 1972 and is based in Olaine, Latvia.

RAR1R.RG.summary: AS Rigas autoelektroaparatu rupnica rents and operates real estate properties in Latvia. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

RKB1R.RG.summary: AS Rigas kugu buvetava provides ship repair, ship building, and other services in the Baltic region. It is also involved in the conversion works for various types of vessels, including lengthening, modernization, refurbishment, etc.; and metal construction works. The company was founded in 1913 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

SAF1R.RG.summary: SAF Tehnika A/S designs, develops, manufactures, and distributes digital microwave transmission equipment worldwide. The company provides wireless backhaul solutions for digital voice and data transmission to fixed and mobile network operators, and data service providers in the public and private sectors. Its products include CFIP radios; Aranet, an environmental monitoring solution; Integra, a radio system; and Spectrum Compact, a measurement tool for field engineers for telecom, broadcasting, and other industries using radio technologies. The company also sells antennas, cables, OEM products, and various accessories purchased from other suppliers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Riga, Latvia.

SCM1R.RG.long_name: AS Siguldas Ciltslietu Un Maksligas Apseklosanas Stacija
SCM1R.RG.summary: AS Siguldas Ciltslietu Un Maksligas Apseklosanas Stacija produces and supplies breeding bull semen in the Republic of Latvia. It also provides milk testing services; and other breeding related services, such as consultations on issues of cattle breeding, feeding and keeping, evaluation of cow exterior, artificial insemination of cows, and initial processing of the supervisory data. In addition, the company provides milk making analysis and milk recording data processing services, as well as engages in animal breeding activities. AS Siguldas Ciltslietu Un Maksligas Apseklosanas Stacija was founded in 1957 and is based in Sigulda, the Republic of Latvia.

SMA1R.RG.summary: AS PATA Saldus produces and sells forestry products in Latvia and Russia. The company operates through Logging, Timber Processing, Transport, and Other segments. It offers round and sawn timber; loggings; and timber and wood transportation services. The company is also involved in the production of board lumber; and wood working and real estate activities. In addition, it offers commercial timber preparation and related services, as well as engages in other sports activities. The company was formerly known as Saldus mezrupnieciba and changed its name to AS PATA Saldus in October 2015. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Saldus, Latvia. AS PATA Saldus is a subsidiary of SIA ÂPATA'.

UIJ.MU.summary: AS VEF engages in managing real estate properties and renting business spaces in the Republic of Latvia. It also provides electricity distribution services for businesses located in VEF territory. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

It is also involved in the conversion works for various types of vessels, including lengthening, modernization, refurbishment, etc.; and metal construction works. The company was founded in 1913 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

UW3.SG.summary: AS Rigas kugu buvetava provides ship repair, ship building, and other services in the Baltic region. It is also involved in the conversion works for various types of vessels, including lengthening, modernization, refurbishment, etc.; and metal construction works. The company was founded in 1913 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

VEF1R.RG.summary: AS VEF engages in managing real estate properties and renting business spaces in the Republic of Latvia. It also provides electricity distribution services for businesses located in VEF territory. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

VPN.MU.summary: AS VEF Radiotehnika RRR produces and sells acoustic systems and their enclosures in Latvia and Italy. The company manufactures speaker cabinets and printed circuit boards; mounts printed circuit boards, including SMD assemblies; and assembles electronic parts and cable harnesses. Its products include active subwoofers, bookshelves, center channels, floor standings, and home theaters. The company also rents real estate properties. In addition, it exports its products. AS VEF Radiotehnika RRR was founded in 1927 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

VSS1R.RG.summary: AS Valmieras stikla skiedra produces and trades in fiberglass and fiberglass products. The company offers E, HR, and SiO2 glass products, including chopped strands, single and twisted yarns, textured yarns and fabrics, technical fabrics, composite fabrics, nettings or meshes, needled mats, stitch-bonded mats, textile membranes, and coated and laminated fabrics. Its products are used in raw materials, thermal insulation, smoke and fire protection products, composites, industrial applications, building materials, architecture and design applications, and acoustic solutions. The company sells its products in the European Union, North America, CIS, and other countries. AS Valmieras stikla skiedra was founded in 1963 and is based in Valmiera, Latvia. As of February 18, 2021, AS Valmieras stikla skiedra operates as a subsidiary of Duke I S.Ã  r.l.

The company provides wireless backhaul solutions for digital voice and data transmission to fixed and mobile network operators, and data service providers in the public and private sectors. Its products include CFIP radios; Aranet, an environmental monitoring solution; Integra, a radio system; and Spectrum Compact, a measurement tool for field engineers for telecom, broadcasting, and other industries using radio technologies. The company also sells antennas, cables, OEM products, and various accessories purchased from other suppliers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Riga, Latvia.
